info.title: Writing
info.description: Enhance your writing with tools for creation, editing, and style refinement

display.name: Writing Assistant
display.description: Drop in any text, email, paragraph, etc., It will be humanly improved and correcting spelling and grammar, enhancing clarity, refining tone, and much more.
prompt_starters: Can you help me improve this paragraph for clarity and flow?
I'd like your feedback on this text, can you enhance its tone and style?
Can you review this writing for grammar mistakes and better word choices?

display.name: Novel Writer
display.description: Writes full length, coherent, dynamic fiction novel books.
prompt_starters: Can you give me ideas for a 1950s thriller mystery?
Write a sci-fi horror story with a surprising twist.
Give me five ideas for a fantasy novel about an alchemist.
Tell me more about Novel Writer and how to use it.

display.name: Copywriter GPT - Marketing, Branding, Ads
display.description: Your innovative specialist for scroll-stopping ad copywriting. Viral marketing strategies fine-tuned to your needs! [New] Now supports Image Ads
prompt_starters: I need an advertisement idea for my product campaign.
Craft the perfect Ad copy for my luxury brand.
[Bonus] Build my business website in 1 min! üåê
[New] Craft an Image Ad

info.title: B12 AI Websites
info.description: Create a professional, engaging, and user-friendly website for your business in seconds using AI.

post.summary: Create a website for the business

link.description: The link to claim newly designed website.

business_description.description: The short description of the business in less than 1000 characters.

cid.description: cid received in previous create website response.

website_hero_subtitle.description: The short and catchy subtitle for hero section of the website in less than 5-10 words. It should capture the goal of the website. It should never mention anything about the website color, style or structure.

display.name: Cover Letter
display.description: Boost interviews with compelling cover letters tailored to job applications  - simple, quick, effective.
prompt_starters: Build My Cover Letter
Tailor Resume to Job Description

post.summary: Add user to waitlist with authentication

display.name: Humanize AI
display.description: Top 1 AI humanizer to help you get human-like content. Humanize your AI-generated content with Free credits available.

info.title: GPTinf Plugin
info.description: A plugin to humanize AI content by paraphrasing.

id.description: The required ID for all the calls.

paraphrased.description: The successful paraphrase of the text. Or request to increase the words limit.

display.name: Text to Video Maker Video AI Scripting
display.description: Create stunning videos with AI Video Maker powered by VideoGPT. Just enter your text, write your script, pick a style, and get full videos with subtitles, voiceovers, stock footage, and viral thumbnails. Fast, simple, and perfect for all creators.
prompt_starters: Let‚Äôs create a viral social video together!
Let's create a marketing video.
Let's create an explainer video.
#help

info.title: invideo AI
info.description: Plugin for crafting narrated videos from text prompts and scripts.

post.summary: Generate video from a detailed brief.

brief.description: Plain english text starting with "Create a video" or "Create a [platform] video"

settings.description: Plain english text covering instructions such as gender and accent of the voiceover, tone of the background music. Can be left empty.

platforms.description: suggest three platforms this video would be ideal for

audiences.description: suggest three audiences this video would be ideal for

length_in_minutes.description: suggest the length of the video in minutes

openaiFileIdRefs.description: list of images to include in the video. These should be created by DALL¬∑E or uploaded by the user. JPG, WEBP, and PNG are supported

script.description: plain english text that is the script of the video

settings.description: Plain english text covering instructions such as gender and accent of the voiceover, tone of the background music. Can be left empty.

platforms.description: suggest three platforms this video would be ideal for

audiences.description: suggest three audiences this video would be ideal for

length_in_minutes.description: suggest the length of the video in minutes

openaiFileIdRefs.description: list of images to include in the video. These should be created by DALL¬∑E or uploaded by the user. JPG, WEBP, and PNG are supported

video_url.description: Show title as markdown link and say click here: [video_title](video_url)

display.name: CV Writer - the CV Expert
display.description: #1 CV Writing AI - An expert in crafting personalised, professional and humanized CVs optimised for ATS (Applicant Tracking System) - Upload a CV to get started or create one from scratch.
prompt_starters: CV creation from scratch
Upload you CV to get started
As a new user what can CV writer do for me?
What is ATS (Applicant Tracking System)?

post.summary: Upload CV info and receive a URL in return.

cv_text.description: The full CV information as a string to be processed.

display.name: Write For Me
prompt_starters: Write a 1000 word essay describing the qualities of AI resilient careers.
What are some little known hacks for creative writing?
